ABOUT

I am a Toronto-based student studying Mechatronics Engineering at the University of Waterloo (class of 2020). My interests and experiences vary from hardware prototyping, web development, and virtual reality, to robotics and graphic design. I have special interests in interactive technological experiences and realising the role engineering plays in society.

I am currently seeking an 8-month coop/internship starting January 2019.
